Buy me a ☕ ϟ FAQ ✪ Masterlist ‎✵ Getting tagged ᗢ My Edits

summary: The gifs you just shared of Clint teaching 'Kate' how to shoot? Thank you for your tags. I've been screaming it since the...
question: The gifs you just shared of Clint teaching 'Kate' how to shoot? Thank you for your tags. I've been screaming it since the trailer dropped. That's totally his daughter, Lila. An older actress with darker hair, but totally not Kate. That's definitely the dusting scene.
answer: I mean speculate and wish it’s all, all you like, but to caption a gif set with such certainty is crazy pants when there’s a more logical answer.  It would also be crazy to caption it as Lila though.  Like we legit have no idea who that girl is except that it’s a girl Clint feels comfortable enough to kiss on the top of the head.  Which, have we ever known Clint to do that?  I don’t ever remember him doing that?

reblog.comment: I mean speculate and wish it’s all, all you like, but to caption a gif set with such certainty is crazy pants when there’s a more logical answer.  It would also be crazy to caption it as Lila though.  Like we legit have no idea who that girl is except that it’s a girl Clint feels comfortable enough to kiss on the top of the head.  Which, have we ever known Clint to do that?  I don’t ever remember him doing that?

trail.content_raw: I mean speculate and wish it’s all, all you like, but to caption a gif set with such certainty is crazy pants when there’s a more logical answer.  It would also be crazy to caption it as Lila though.  Like we legit have no idea who that girl is except that it’s a girl Clint feels comfortable enough to kiss on the top of the head.  Which, have we ever known Clint to do that?  I don’t ever remember him doing that?
trail.content: I mean speculate and wish it’s all, all you like, but to caption a gif set with such certainty is crazy pants when there’s a more logical answer.  It would also be crazy to caption it as Lila though.  Like we legit have no idea who that girl is except that it’s a girl Clint feels comfortable enough to kiss on the top of the head.  Which, have we ever known Clint to do that?  I don’t ever remember him doing that?

summary: NEW Avengers​ Endgame TV trailer promises to bring back our heroes, "Whatever it takes."  The remaining Avengers have teamed up...

NEW Avengers​ Endgame TV trailer promises to bring back our heroes, “Whatever it takes." 

The remaining Avengers have teamed up with Captain Marvel to set things right. Here’s the Avengers: Endgame footage we’ve seen so far.

More in my Avengers: Endgame​ trailers roundup article on CNET​ here.

summary: Marvel Releases New Official Synopsis for Avengers: Endgame: "Final Stand"
title: Marvel Releases New Official Synopsis for Avengers: Endgame: "Final Stand"
body:
Marvel Releases New Official Synopsis for Avengers: Endgame: “Final Stand”

Marvel released a brand new official synopsis for Avengers: Endgame on the movie’s official website.

It reads:

“The grave course of events set in motion by Thanos that wiped out half the universe and fractured the Avengers ranks compels the remaining Avengers to take one final stand in Marvel Studios’ grand conclusion to twenty-two films, “Avengers: Endgame.””

The synopsis is rather interesting…

View On WordPress

summary: I don’t understand what the big deal is about Carol wearing makeup in the 2 second clip from the Endgame trailer?She was wearing...
body: I don’t understand what the big deal is about Carol wearing makeup in the 2 second clip from the Endgame trailer?She was wearing makeup in Captain Marvel too…it’s a movie she’s gonna have makeup on.All they added was lipstick and y’all are acting like it’s the end of the world. She’s literally wearing eyeshadow,eyeliner and mascara in Captain Marvel y’all like?? And for the tight shirt she probs borrowed those clothes. Like the clothes she wore in Captain Marvel were clothes she stole from a mannequin they weren’t hers. And I’m assuming she’s borrowing those clothes she’s wearing in the two second clip from Black Widow. And as for her hair. It was curly and now it’s straight. Once again not a big deal. They were probs trying to make her look different since it’s been like ya know over 20 years?? We have literally no context for this scene at all and it may even be a fake scene put in the trailer. Yeah the Russo Brothers have a lot of issues but like y’all are making mountains out of mole hills with this two second clip

They were probs trying to make her look different since it’s been like ya know over 20 years?? We have literally no context for this scene at all and it may even be a fake scene put in the trailer. Yeah the Russo Brothers have a lot of issues but like y’all are making mountains out of mole hills with this two second clip

summary: First TV Spot for Avengers: Endgame Released
title: First TV Spot for Avengers: Endgame Released
body:
First TV Spot for #AvengersEndgame Released

This morning Marvel released the first ever TV spot for Avengers: Endgame!

There is absolutely no new footage in the trailer, aside from more clips from past MCU movies, but the TV spot does feature new dialog from Cap giving one of his inspiring speeches; presumably to the rest of the Avengers.

If they’re doing TV spots now, it’s very possible that advanced ticket sales could be happening very…

View On WordPress

summary: Saw a news alert that they had released the official synopsis for Endgame and I was like BAHAHA YEAH RIGHT THEY AREN'T TELLING...
body:
Saw a news alert that they had released the official synopsis for Endgame and I was like BAHAHA YEAH RIGHT THEY AREN’T TELLING US SHIT and sure enough, the synopsis reads “The grave course of events set in motion by Thanos that wiped out half the universe and fractured the Avengers ranks compels the remaining Avengers to take one final stand in Marvel Studios’ grand conclusion to twenty-two films, Avengers: Endgame.”

Marvel, you already have our money. Stop this unless you’re actually gonna say something that matters. And we don’t even really WANT more info at this point… we just want the movie. The hush hush style of the marketing for this movie has been kinda genius imo. Still… AHHHH!

Marvel, you already have our money. Stop this unless you’re actually gonna say something that matters. And we don’t even really WANT more info at this point… we just want the movie. The hush hush style of the marketing for this movie has been kinda genius imo. Still… AHHHH!
